text: (d) Certification of shiplot grain—(1)
label: BODY

text: Basic requirement. The certificate shall
label: BODY

text: show (i) if applicable, a statement that
label: BODY

text: the grain has been loaded aboard with
label: BODY

text: other grain, (ii) the official weight, (iii)
label: BODY

text: the stowage or other identification of
label: BODY

text: the grain, and (iv) other information
label: BODY

text: required by the regulations and the in-
label: BODY

text: structions.
label: BODY

text: (2) Common stowage. (i) Without sepa-
label: BODY

text: ration. If bulk grain is offered for
label: BODY

text: weighing as it is being loaded aboard a
label: BODY

text: ship and is loaded without separation
label: BODY

text: in a stowage area with other grain or
label: BODY

text: another commodity, the weight certifi-
label: BODY

text: cate for the grain in each lot shall
label: BODY

text: show that the lot was loaded aboard
label: BODY

text: with other grain or another commodity
label: BODY

text: without separation and the relative lo-
label: BODY

text: cation of the grain.
label: BODY

text: (ii) With separation. If separations are
label: BODY

text: laid between adjacent lots, the weight
label: BODY

text: certificates shall show the kind of ma-
label: BODY

text: terial used in the separations and the
label: BODY

text: location of the separations in relation
label: BODY

text: to each lot.
label: BODY

text: (iii) Exception. The common stowage
label: BODY

text: requirements of this paragraph shall
label: BODY

text: not be applicable to the first lot in a
label: BODY

text: stowage area unless a second lot has
label: BODY

text: been loaded, in whole or in part, in the
label: BODY

text: stowage area before issuing the official
label: BODY

text: weight certificate for the first lot.
label: BODY

text: (3) Official mark. If the grain is offi-
label: BODY

text: cially weighed in a reasonably contin-
label: BODY

text: uous operation, upon request by the ap-
label: BODY

text: plicant, the following statement may
label: BODY

text: be shown on the weight certificate:
label: BODY

text: ‘‘Loaded
label: BODY

text: under
label: BODY

text: continuous
label: BODY

text: official
label: BODY

text: weighing.’’
label: BODY

text: Weighing grain in combined
label: BODY

text: lots.
label: BODY

text: (a) General. The weighing of bulk or
label: BODY

text: sacked grain loaded aboard, or being
label: BODY

text: loaded aboard, or unloaded from two or
label: BODY

text: more carriers as a combined lot shall
label: BODY

text: be conducted according to this section
label: BODY

text: and the instructions.
label: BODY

text: (b) Weighing procedure. (1) Single lot
label: BODY

text: weighing. Single lots of grain that are
label: BODY

text: to be weighed as a combined lot shall
label: BODY

text: be weighed in one location. The grain
label: BODY

text: loaded into or unloaded from each car-
label: BODY

text: rier must be weighed in accordance
label: BODY

text: with procedures prescribed in the in-
label: BODY

text: structions. In the case of sacked grain,
label: BODY

text: a representative weight sample shall be
label: BODY

text: obtained from the grain in each carrier
label: BODY

text: unless otherwise specified in the in-
label: BODY

text: structions.
label: BODY

text: (2) Recertification. Grain that has
label: BODY

text: been weighed and certificated as two or
label: BODY

text: more single lots may be recertificated
label: BODY

text: as a combined lot provided that (i) the
label: BODY

text: grain in each single lot has been
label: BODY

text: weighed in one location, (ii) the origi-
label: BODY

text: nal weight certificates issued for the
label: BODY

text: single lots have been or will be surren-
label: BODY

text: dered to the appropriate agency or field
label: BODY

text: office, (iii) the official personnel who
label: BODY

text: performed the weighing service for the
label: BODY

text: single lots and the official personnel
label: BODY

text: who are to recertificate the grain as a
label: BODY

text: combined
label: BODY

text: lot
label: BODY

text: determine
label: BODY

text: that
label: BODY

text: the
label: BODY

text: weight of the grain in the lots has not
label: BODY

text: since changed and, in the case of
label: BODY

text: sacked grain, that the weight samples
label: BODY

text: used as a basis for weighing the single
label: BODY

text: lots were representative at the time of
label: BODY

text: the weighing.
label: BODY

text: (3) Grain uniform in quality. An appli-
label: BODY

text: cant
label: BODY

text: may
label: BODY

text: request
label: BODY

text: that
label: BODY

text: grain
label: BODY

text: weighed and certificated as a combined
label: BODY

text: lot whether or not the grain is uniform
label: BODY

text: in quality for the purpose of inspection
label: BODY

text: under the Act.
label: BODY

text: (c) Certification procedures—(1) Gen-
label: BODY

text: eral. Each certificate for a combined-
label: BODY

text: lot Class X or Class Y weighing service
label: BODY

text: shall show the identification for the
label: BODY

text: ‘‘Combined lot’’ or, at the request of
label: BODY

text: the applicant, the identification of
label: BODY

text: each carrier in the combined lot. The
label: BODY

text: identification and any seal information
label: BODY

text: for the carriers may be shown on the
label: BODY

text: reverse side of the weight certificate,
label: BODY

text: provided the statement ‘‘See reverse
label: BODY

text: side’’ is shown on the face of the cer-
label: BODY

text: tificate in the space provided for re-
label: BODY

text: marks.
label: BODY

text: (2) Recertification. If a request for a
label: BODY

text: combined-lot Class X or Class Y weigh-
label: BODY

text: ing service is filed after the grain in
label: BODY

text: the single lots has been weighed and
label: BODY

text: certificated, the combined-lot weighing
label: BODY

text: certificate shall show (i) the date of
label: BODY

text: weighing the grain in the combined lot
label: BODY

text: (if the single lots were weighed on dif-
label: BODY

text: ferent dates, the latest of the dates
label: BODY

text: shall be shown); (ii) a serial number,
label: BODY

text: other than the serial numbers of the
label: BODY

text: weight certificates that are to be su-
label: BODY

text: perseded; (iii) the name of the elevator
label: BODY

text: from which or into which the grain in
label: BODY

text: the combined lot was loaded or un-
label: BODY

text: loaded; (iv) a statement showing the
label: BODY

text: weight of the grain in the combined
label: BODY

text: lot; (v) a completed statement showing
label: BODY

text: the identification of any superseded
label: BODY

text: certificate as follows: ‘‘This combined-
label: BODY

text: lot certificate supersedes certificate
label: BODY

text: Nos. ll, dated ll; and (vi) if at the
label: BODY

text: time
label: BODY

text: issuing
label: BODY

text: the
label: BODY

text: combined-lot
label: BODY

text: weight certificate the superseded cer-
label: BODY

text: tificates are not in the custody of the
label: BODY

text: agency or field office, the statement
label: BODY

text: ‘‘The superseded certificates identified
label: BODY

text: herein have not been surrendered’’
label: BODY

text: shall be clearly shown, in the space
label: BODY

text: provided for remarks, beneath the
label: BODY

text: statement identifying the superseded
label: BODY

text: certificates. If the superseded certifi-
label: BODY

text: cates are in the custody of the agency
label: BODY

text: or field office, the superseded certifi-
label: BODY

text: cates shall be clearly marked ‘‘Void.’’
label: BODY

text: (3) Part lot. If a part of a combined lot
label: BODY

text: of grain in inbound carriers is unloaded
label: BODY

text: and a part is left in the carriers, the
label: BODY

text: grain that is unloaded shall be certifi-
label: BODY

text: cated in accordance with the provisions
label: BODY

text: (4) Official mark. When grain is
label: BODY

text: weighed as a combined lot in one con-
label: BODY

text: tinuous operation, upon request by the
label: BODY

text: applicant,
label: BODY

text: the
label: BODY

text: following
label: BODY

text: statement
label: BODY

text: shall be shown on the weight certifi-
label: BODY

text: cate: ‘‘Loaded under continuous official
label: BODY

text: weighing,’’ or ‘‘Loaded under contin-
label: BODY

text: uous official inspection and weighing.’’
label: BODY

text: (5) Further combining. After a com-
label: BODY

text: bined-lot weight certificate has been
label: BODY

text: issued, there shall be no further com-
label: BODY

text: bining and no dividing of the certifi-
label: BODY

text: cate.
label: BODY

text: Limitations.
label: BODY

text: combined-lot
label: BODY

text: weight certificate shall be issued (i) for
label: BODY

text: any weighing service other than as de-
label: BODY

text: scribed in this section or (ii) which
label: BODY

text: shows a weight of grain different from
label: BODY

text: the total of the combined single lot.
label: BODY

text: Checkweighing sacked grain.
label: BODY

text: (a) General. Each checkweighing serv-
label: BODY

text: ice performed on a lot of sacked grain
label: BODY

text: to determine the weight of the grain
label: BODY

text: shall be made on the basis of one or
label: BODY

text: more official weight samples obtained
label: BODY

text: from the grain by official personnel ac-
label: BODY

text: cording to this section and procedures
label: BODY

text: prescribed in the instructions.
label: BODY

text: (b) Representative sample. No official
label: BODY

text: weight sample shall be considered to be
label: BODY

text: representative of a lot of sacked grain
label: BODY

text: unless the sample is of the size pre-
label: BODY

text: scribed in the instructions and has
label: BODY

text: been obtained and weighed according
label: BODY

text: to the procedures prescribed in the in-
label: BODY

text: structions.
label: BODY

text: (c) Protecting samples and data. Offi-
label: BODY

text: cial personnel and other employees of
label: BODY

text: an agency or the Service shall protect
label: BODY

text: official weight samples and data from
label: BODY

text: manipulation, substitution, and im-
label: BODY

text: proper and careless handling which
label: BODY

text: might deprive the samples and sample
label: BODY

text: data of their representativeness.
label: BODY

text: (d) Restriction on weighing. No agency
label: BODY

text: shall weigh any lot of sacked grain un-
label: BODY

text: less at the time of obtaining the offi-
label: BODY

text: cial weight sample the grain from
label: BODY

text: which the sample was obtained was lo-
label: BODY

text: cated within the area of responsibility
label: BODY

text: assigned to the agency, except as oth-
label: BODY

text: erwise provided for in § 800.117, or on a
label: BODY

text: case-by-case basis as determined by the
label: BODY

text: Administrator.
label: BODY

text: (e) Equipment and labor. Each appli-
label: BODY

text: cant for weighing services shall provide
label: BODY

text: necessary labor for obtaining official
label: BODY

text: weight samples and place the samples
label: BODY

text: in a position for weighing and shall
label: BODY

text: supply suitable weighing equipment ap-
label: BODY

text: proved by the Service, pursuant to the
label: BODY

text: regulations and the instructions.
label: BODY

text: (f) Disposition of official weight sam-
label: BODY

text: ples. In weighing sacked grain in lots,
label: BODY

text: the grain in the official weight samples
label: BODY

text: shall be returned to the lots from
label: BODY

text: which the samples were obtained.
label: BODY

text: (g) Provisions by kinds of service—(1)
label: BODY

text: ‘‘IN’’ movements. Each checkweighing
label: BODY

text: on an ‘‘IN’’ movement of sacked grain
label: BODY

text: shall be based on an official weight
label: BODY

text: sample obtained while the grain is at
label: BODY

text: rest in the carrier or during unloading,
label: BODY

text: in accordance with procedures pre-
label: BODY

text: scribed in the instructions.
label: BODY

text: (2) ‘‘OUT’’ movements (export). Each
label: BODY

text: checkweighing of sacked export grain
label: BODY

text: shall be based on an official weight
label: BODY

text: sample obtained as the grain is being
label: BODY

text: loaded aboard the final carrier, as the
label: BODY

text: grain is being sacked, or while the
label: BODY

text: grain is at rest in a warehouse or hold-
label: BODY

text: ing facility, in accordance with proce-
label: BODY

text: dures prescribed in the instructions.
label: BODY
